title: Stalingrad (D ´1992)
notes: 1993 Joseph Vilsmaier German war epic about Wehrmacht soldiers in 1942-43 Stalingrad battle - distinctive German perspective on WWII Eastern Front

title: Staub der Zeit (Bruno Ganz)
notes: 2008 Theo Angelopoulos contemplative drama with Bruno Ganz, Willem Dafoe about American film director tracing family history through 20th century - final completed Angelopoulos feature

title: Stratos (GR '2014)
notes: 2014 Yannis Economides Greek social drama about man in Athens during economic crisis - distinctive contemporary Greek realism

title: Straw Dogs – Wer Gewalt säht (USA ´2011_DNF)
notes: 2011 Rod Lurie remake of Sam Peckinpah's 1971 controversial thriller with James Marsden, Kate Bosworth - Deep South instead of rural England

title: St. Vincent – Mein himmlischer Nachbar (USA ´14)
notes: 2014 Theodore Melfi comedy-drama with Bill Murray as cantankerous Brooklyn retiree befriending neighbor's boy - distinctive Murray character role

title: Suburbicon – Der Tod wohnt in der Vorstadt
notes: 2017 George Clooney dark comedy-thriller with Matt Damon about 1950s suburban murder and racial integration - Coen Brothers script

title: Suche nach e. Freund fürs Ende d. Welt (USA_/TR)
corrected: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
notes: 2012 Lorene Scafaria apocalyptic rom-com with Steve Carell, Keira Knightley about unlikely companions during final weeks before asteroid impact - distinctive end-of-world premise
suggested_search: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World

title: Sunshine – Ein Hauch v. Sonnenschein_D/Ö ´1999)
notes: 1999 István Szabó epic with Ralph Fiennes playing three generations of Hungarian Jewish family through 20th century history - 3-hour sweeping historical drama

title: Szenen einer Eher (Bergmann_Liv Ullmann)
notes: 1973 Ingmar Bergman Swedish TV miniseries with Liv Ullmann, Erland Josephson about marriage dissolution - typo: Ehe not Eher, original title distinctive
